section.p: The Allergies and Other Adverse Reactions Section contains data on the substance intolerances and the associated adverse reactions suffered by the patient. At a minimum, currently active and any relevant historical allergies and adverse reactions shall be listed.

ol.li: Conforms to IHE Allergies Reactions Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.13)
Conforms to CCD Alerts Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.2)
Conforms to IHE Allergies Reactions Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.13)
[CCD] SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code = "48765-2" Allergies, adverse reactions, alerts (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC 2.26)

[CCD] SHOULD contain [1..*] entry, such that it
contains CCD Problem Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.27)
[CCD] SHOULD satisfy: Contains a case-insensitive language-insensitive string containing "alert" and/or "allergies and adverse reactions".
[CCD] SHALL satisfy: The absence of known allergies, adverse reactions or alerts SHALL be explicitly asserted.
